description: A Content Management System (CMS) written with Ruby on Rails

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The Amazon Web Services IAM user key

AWS_COGNITO_CLIENT_ID.description: The Amazon Web Services Cognito client ID

AWS_COGNITO_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Amazon Web Services Cognito client secret

AWS_COGNITO_DOMAIN.description: The Amazon Web Services Cognito domain

AWS_COGNITO_USER_POOL_ID.description: The Amazon Web Services Cognito user pool ID

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: The Amazon Web Services S3 bucket name

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The Amazon Web Services IAM user secret

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Set to same as the Heroku App name (set automatically for review apps)

RACK_TIMEOUT_SERVICE_TIMEOUT.description: Number of seconds a page is allowed to run

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A randomly generated secret to verify sessions

SEED_SITE_EMAIL.description: The default email from address for sites

SEED_SITE_HOST.description: The host for the first site (defaults to HEROKU_APP_NAME.herokuapp.com)
